analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sa nidassana ttika sa vicāra duka

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ savicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham sa vicāram dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na sa vicāraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate cha

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ avicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naavicāro dhammo
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham avicāram dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na avicāraḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ avicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham avicāram dhammam paṭicca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: naavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ avicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na avicāraḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham avicāram dhammam paṭicca

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho naavicāro ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naavicāro ca dhammā uppajjanti
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na avicāraḥ ca na anidassana sa paṭighaḥ na avicāraḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti
hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
